data.meta_description: Nativa SPA is a plant-based body care brand rooted in Brazil and powered by nutrient-rich quinoa for superior skin wellness.
data.text:
Blending Brazilian beauty, wellness, and sustainability, we welcome the newest member of the Nativa SPA family, the iconic Brazilian supermodel and former Victoria's Secret Angel, LaÃ­s Ribeiro! In an exciting collaboration, LaÃ­s is set to become our brand ambassador, and we couldn't be more excited about the incredible journey that awaits us.

The Perfect Blend: LaÃ­s Ribeiro and Nativa SPA

Nativa SPA is a well-loved body care and wellness brand from Brazil that has earned its reputation for holistic self-care and a deep commitment to sustainability. LaÃ­s Ribeiro, who embodies the spirit of Brazilian energy and warmth, is the ideal partner to represent the brand's values.

LaÃ­s shares a personal connection with Nativa SPA's values, as she incorporates their products into her daily self-care routine. She's also a strong advocate for the brand's core principles: sustainability, being 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and using nutrient-rich quinoa oil in their products.

What To Expect

The inspiring partnership promises to bring a wealth of beauty and wellness insights. LaÃ­s, with her radiant beauty and in-depth knowledge of self-care, will be sharing her beauty tips and favorite Nativa Spa products. It's an opportunity for all of our community to learn from a world-renowned icon about how to achieve a radiant and healthy look while also contributing to a more sustainable future and taking wellness into consideration

Stay In the Loop

Excited to know more about this partnership and what it holds for our Nativa Spa community? Head over to LaÃ­s Ribeiro's Instagram or Nativa SPA's Instagram to watch our intro video and stay tuned for the exciting content we have in store for you. You won't want to miss a single moment of this incredible journey.

Nativa SPA has been a pioneer in combining the principles of holistic self-care and environmental responsibility. LaÃ­s Ribeiro's collaboration with the brand is set to amplify these values and bring them to a global audience. Whether you are a long-time fan of Nativa Spa or discovering the brand for the first time, this partnership promises to be a source of inspiration and a celebration of natural beauty.

So, don't forget to follow both LaÃ­s Ribeiro and Nativa SPA on Instagram to be the first to experience this insightful learning journey. Your radiant and sustainable wellness quest starts here!
